text: [Music]
hi I'm Romeo a cloud support engineer
here at AWS office in Bangalore India
today I'm going to show you how to set
up an email redirecting rule in Amazon
Walkman so let's get started
email redirection is a helpful option
because redirection sends the email to
the intended party in its original
written state also any replies to the
redirected mail go directly to the
original sender sign into the Amazon
work mail web application using the
credentials for the account you want to
redirect emails from select the gear
icon on the top right from the left
navigation pane select email rules and
then select new enter a name for the
rule
and make sure the active rule checkbox
is strict in the conditions select the
drop-down menu and then choose the
condition that you want to apply for
this rule for example you can choose is
sent to and choose select recipients
choose the user account that you want to
redirect emails from under actions
select redirect the message to and then
select the recipients on the right
enter the email address where you want
to redirect the emails to
select okay and then click Save Changes
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
